parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Third person singular active present of deo; also deon deh-on'; neuter active participle of the same; both used impersonally; it is Necessary.
From pros and echo; to hold the mind towards, i.e. Pay attention to, be cautious about, apply oneself to, adhere to.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Passive - Dative Neuter Plural
str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.

word: so that we do not drift away.
parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: From para and the alternate of rheo; to flow by, i.e. carelessly pass.
